description:
This package allows users to consume CloudCIX services easily. 
Connect to CloudCIX HTTP/S services and get RestSharp responses.
releaseNotes:
Version 1.1.1
-cloudcix_auth and ad_auth deprecated in favour of the standard authentication method password. Do not use the idMember, use the OpenStack domain id, os_id field in the Member and User objects.
-CloudCIXAuth class renamed to KeystoneAuth.
-account_sale_debit_note and account_sale_debit_note_contra renamed to account_sale_credit_note and account_sale_credit_note_contra in Financial.
-cash_sale_debit_note and cash_sale_debit_note_contra services renamed to the cash_sale_credit_note and cash_sale_credit_note_contra in Financial.
-Antenna API deprecated.
-rent and off_rent clients added to Asset API.
-Circuit API added with the property_type, circuit_class and circuit clients.
-pool_ip, ipmi and location_hasher clients added to DNS.
-business_logic and debtor_account_statement_log clients added to Financial.
-warrantor_logic, service_centre_logic, warrantor_service_centre and service_centre_warrantor clients added to HelpDesk.
-bin, bin_sku, sku_stock_adjustment clients added to SCM.

Version 1.1.0
-Support for new services added:
Plot (BETA, only list methods available).

Version 1.0.9
-Support for new services added:
Asset
Financial (BETA - still on development)
Security
-get_administrative_token method now retries up to 5 times.
-Usage Sample now returning indented JSON.

Version 1.0.8
-New services added to the following applications:
App Manager
Contacts
HelpDesk
Reporting
SCM
Support Framework

Version 1.0.7
-Added support for BETA version of Reporting services.

Version 1.0.6
-Added support for BETA version of SCM (Supply Chain Management) services.
-Admin token is now cached.
-Refresh token method retired.

Version 1.0.5
-New services added to Contacts and DNS applications.
-Added support for new HelpDesk and Scheduler applications.
-Added support for BETA versions of SupportFramework and AppManager applications.

Version 1.0.4
-If the admin token can't be refreshed a new token will be issued.
-Added support for new Training application.

Version 1.0.3
-Fixed an issue with the Membership Notification service path.

Version 1.0.2
-Fixed an issue with query parameters.

Version 1.0.1
-Fixed an issue refreshing the token.

Version 1.0.0
-First SDK prototype
summary: CloudCIX SDK allows users to consume CloudCIX services.
title: CloudCIX-SDK
